version_description: Prepared the app for the first release!

- Bug fixes
- Preparations to add new content
The last update before we launch Intermediate Python!
Practice Mode arrives on Mobile!

Introducing our new Mobile Coding Courses for Python! Learn Python by writing real code on the go in our new interactive coding courses. Using state-of-the-art features like a custom keyboard and auto-complete for coding, writing code is as easy as sending a text message.
We've improved the stability of the app when you submit the answers to your exercises.
We've fixed a couple of minor bugs that were affecting some of our users.
This release contains several minor bug fixes that improve the overall learning experience.

The app has been completely redesigned to make learning data science easier and more fun!

NEW: learn to code in 5-minutes per day with a new lesson format.
NEW: It's easier than ever to measure your progress with a new homescreen design.
NEW: Find what you need to learn faster than ever with an easier way to explore content.

This version contains a *brand new* coding experience! Learning to code is faster and easier than ever.
* Easily flip between video and coding
* Intelligent autosuggestions
* One-touch copy/paste
* Undo/redo
* Improved navigation
* and more!

* and more!
